abstract: New York Times Co says it plans to close its editing and prepress print production operations in Paris, eliminating up to 70 jobs.
lead_paragraph: The changes will result in the elimination or relocation of up to 70 jobs, and are part of a plan to redesign the international print paper.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Plans to Close Paris Editing and Press Operations
headline.print_headline: Times to Close Paris Editing and Press Units

snippet: The changes will result in the elimination or relocation of up to 70 jobs, and are part of a plan to redesign the international print paper.
